reviews.review_msg: Takes the time to clearly communicate the concepts which are usually fairly complex. One of the best profs I've encountered so far.

her take-home exam for this class was kind of tricky and her lecture's - kind of boring. be prepared to spend all day in the library photocopying: she doesn't post her notes but sometimes she'll be nice and give you a copy.
REALLY GREAT PROF. ALWAYS HELPFUL, VERY NICE. HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS CLASS AS A GPA BOOSTER!
